nodes.text: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 24

Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 24 is the twenty-fourth, penultimate issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. It was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and published on November 28, 2018 by Marvel Comics.
"FORTRESS VADER" - PART 6 The FORTRESS will stand, but at a terrible cost. The fire will come to MUSTAFAR, and all will burn. The final design is revealed, woven from war, treachery and pain.
